game.name: Chef Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Chef Simulator lets you a multiplayer cooking experience with your friends up to 8 players. Be the master about 80 realistic cook recipes and experience realistic physics kitchen environment. You are the Chef here. Play it your way - help your friends in kitchen or even sabotage them!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Chef Simulator lets you a multiplayer cooking experience with your friends up to 8 players. Be the master about 80 realistic cook recipes and experience realistic physics kitchen environment. You are the Chef here. Play it your way - help your friends in kitchen or even sabotage them!
